		else if( trim($_POST['content_text']) == "" )
		{
			$msg = "Please write a few lines of content.";
		}
		else
		{
			$content_status = $_POST['content_status'] == "Active" ? 1 : 0;
			$is_saved = $content_id > 0 ? $content_obj -> update_content( $_POST['parent_id'], $_POST['content_title'], $_POST['content_text'], $_POST['meta_title'], $_POST['meta_description'], $_POST['meta_keywords'], $_POST['sef_link'], $content_status, $content_id ) : $content_obj -> add_content( $_POST['parent_id'], $_POST['content_title'], $_POST['content_text'], $_POST['meta_title'], $_POST['meta_description'], $_POST['meta_keywords'], $_POST['sef_link'], $content_status );
			$msg = $is_saved ? "Changes Saved." : "Changes could not be saved.";
		}
	}	//	End of if( isset( $_POST['Save'] ) )
	
	if( $content_id > 0 )
	{
		$r = $content_obj -> get_content_info( $content_id, 0 );
		$content_title = $r['content_title']; $content_text = $r['content_text']; $parent_id = $r['parent_id'];
		$meta_title = $r['meta_title']; $meta_description = $r['meta_description']; 
		$meta_keywords = $r['meta_keywords'];	$sef_link = $r['sef_link'];  $content_status = $r['content_status']; 
	}
	else
	{
		$content_title = $content_text = $parent_id = $meta_title = $meta_description = ""; 
		$meta_keywords = $sef_link = $content_status = "";
	}
